publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5129 Mr Frank McAveety: Congratulations to the Holy Cross Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates Holy Cross Primary School for its recent outstanding review from HM Inspectorate of Education; commends the head teacher for his leadership, teachers for their dedication to improving performance and all staff in the school for providing such a caring environment for the pupils; recognises the motivation and enthusiasm of the pupils, and praises the inclusive approach to meeting children’s needs and fostering a positive environment for students of all social, economic and national backgrounds. Supported by: Paul Martin*, Charlie Gordon*, Bill Butler*, Pauline McNeill*, Des McNulty*, Claire Baker*
